english: I'm getting ready for a party.
I'm choosing an outfit for the party.
I'm buying a gift for the host.
I'm on my way to the party.
I'm greeting people at the party.
I'm enjoying the music and dancing.
I'm having good conversations with people.
I'm congratulating the guest of honor.
I'm wishing the birthday boy/girl a happy birthday.
arabic: أتمنى لصبي/فتاة عيد الميلاد عيد ميلاد سعيد.

english: I'm offering to help the host with anything.
arabic: أعرض المساعدة على المضيف في أي شيء.

english: I'm feeling hungry and trying the food.
I'm thanking the host for a lovely party.
I'm calling a taxi to go home.
arabic: أطلب سيارة أجرة للعودة إلى المنزل.

english: I had a great time at the party!
arabic: لقد قضيت وقتًا رائعًا في الحفلة!

english: I need to recover from a long night of partying.
arabic: أحتاج إلى التعافي من ليلة طويلة من الحفلات.
